attributes.action: Bring to justice those responsable for the 6 redcaps murdered in iraq in 2003.
attributes.background: As the goverment prepares to bring BRITISH TROOPS to justice for war crimes in iraq we should also use our tax money to bring to justice those that commited war crimes against our troops.

rejection.details:
The investigation of these crimes is the responsibility of the authorities in Iraq. 

You could start a new petition urging the UK Government to offer assistance to the government of Iraq for the investigation.
